ccre.cluck

Class Cluck

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.cluck.Cluck

  • public final class Cluck
extends java.lang.Object
    A storage location for the current CluckNode, CluckTCPServer, and CluckTCPClient.
    Author:
    skeggsc

        Parameters:
        remote - The remote address.
        linkName - The local link name.
        hintedRemoteName - The hint for what the remote server should call this.

        public static LoggingTarget subscribeLT(java.lang.String path,
                        LogLevel minimum)
        Subscribe to a LoggingTarget from the network at the specified path, with only sending data for at least a minimum logging level.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to subscribe to.
        minimum - The minimum logging level to send over the network.
        Returns:
        the LoggingTarget.

      • publish

        public static void publish(java.lang.String name,
           BooleanInput input)
        Publish a BooleanInput on the network. This will send values to clients when they connect.
        Parameters:
        name - The name for the BooleanInput.
        input - The BooleanInput.

      • subscribeBI

        public static BooleanInput subscribeBI(java.lang.String path,
                       boolean shouldSubscribeByDefault)
        Subscribe to a BooleanInput from the network at the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to subscribe to.
        shouldSubscribeByDefault - Should this request the value from the remote by default, as opposed to waiting until this is needed. If this is false, then readValue() won't work until you run addTarget().
        Returns:
        the BooleanInput.
